The photo was published on Twitter on Oc: 2020, and has been retweeted over 390 times and liked over 1,300 times.
The Twitter post: s simplified Chinese caption translates to English as: "A phone was snatched by a monkey, and the monkey took a selfie. As a result, this photo won the selfie category championship of the 2020 iPhone Photography Awards."
Other Twitter users left comments expres: such as asking how many bananas should be rewarded to the monkey and stating that animals have better art talent than humans.
The photo has been shared multiple times: claiming to have won the photo contest in both 2020 and 2019. However, the photo is not included among the official winners featured on the iPhone Photography Awards website.
